sqlMap.select: SELECT T.PROD_OFFER_ID, T.PROD_OFFER_NAME, T.OFFER_NBR, A.NAME, T.PROD_OFFER_DESC FROM PROD_OFFER T,PROD_OFFER_CHANNEL TT, CHANNEL TTT, ORG A WHERE TT.AUDIT_FLOW_ID = #AUDIT_FLOW_ID# AND T.PROD_OFFER_ID = TT.PROD_OFFER_ID AND TT.CHANNEL_ID = TTT.CHANNEL_ID AND TT.STATUS_CD = '1299' AND TTT.STATUS_CD = '1000' AND T.OFFER_PROVIDER_ID = A.ORG_ID AND T.TENANT_ID=#tenantId# AND TT.TENANT_ID=#tenantId# AND TTT.TENANT_ID=#tenantId# AND A.TENANT_ID=#tenantId#
sqlMap.update: UPDATE PROD_OFFER_CHANNEL SET STATUS_CD = #STATUS_CD# WHERE AUDIT_FLOW_ID = #AUDIT_FLOW_ID# AND TENANT_ID=#tenantId#
